Now they have started selling the same cans  at 5 cans for $8. So to buy 10 will now cost $16. A difference of $4. I asked him again he said another few minutes. The Store manager was to  busy talking to him .She didn't day anything. I said l will go to woolworth's she said to me ...Well go there...I thought for 2 managers to not action my request was a poorly. I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. They are not user friendly. They take up so much time, groceries don't alway scan at the right price and if something doesn't scan correct, you have to get assistance, in the mean time my icecream has started to melt. I don't even get a discount on my items for cutting out the middle man, why employ people when you have a machine. I am almost ready to throw my groceries at the checkout machine. Lol","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6372e318b84cc27618ec01df","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"V Rh","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/5e5b1669d6661a0ce7c703c4/"},"datePublished":"2022-11-15T02:53:44.000Z","headline":"What has happened to the once reliable…","reviewBody":"What has happened to the once reliable company of Coles.  I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. The Warradale store in SA used to be excellent, it's now absolute rubbish. There are always huge gaps on shelves and items unavailable. Clearly, Coles are not interested in customers and just regard them as a means to an end. Nobody likes using self-serve checkouts, but fewer staff means more profit. Lol","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6372e318b84cc27618ec01df","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"V Rh","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/5e5b1669d6661a0ce7c703c4/"},"datePublished":"2022-11-15T02:53:44.000Z","headline":"What has happened to the once reliable…","reviewBody":"What has happened to the once reliable company of Coles.  I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I asked him again he said another few minutes. The Store manager was to  busy talking to him .She didn't day anything. I said l will go to woolworth's she said to me ...Well go there...I thought for 2 managers to not action my request was a poorly. I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!) Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!) Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. They remind me of the fly buys, which is a fun incentive. The staff is friendly and efficient. What they are not so vocal about is that they are not supporting Australian businesses.  The bags are made in Vietnam.  (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. One of the most incompetent & inept Coles stores in NSW, their click n collect service is hopeless. They never get it right. This time around I went to collect order in allocated slot. The order hadn’t been picked! Had to wait in my car for 25mins! I’ll start shopping at local IGA! Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!) Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!) Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. Lol","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6372e318b84cc27618ec01df","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"V Rh","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/5e5b1669d6661a0ce7c703c4/"},"datePublished":"2022-11-15T02:53:44.000Z","headline":"What has happened to the once reliable…","reviewBody":"What has happened to the once reliable company of Coles.  I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. They remind me of the fly buys, which is a fun incentive. The staff is friendly and efficient. What they are not so vocal about is that they are not supporting Australian businesses.  The bags are made in Vietnam.  (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers. Awful experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62fa10548000af4a885e938d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Valentin Margulius","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62fa0c5be7527700131deac1/"},"datePublished":"2022-08-15T11:22:28.000Z","headline":"Environmental Hypocrites","reviewBody":"Coles likes to eat their cake and to have it at the same time. Their TV advertising shows us how great they are at recycling, while at the same time their prepackaged foods in hard plastic containers like meats, sea foods, fruits and vegetables take increasing space on their shelves. Not only those plastic packs add to the cost of the product, but they also add millions of items to the mountains of unprocessed plastics that keep growing across the country. Amazing wastage, all in the name of convenience? Not for me, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/62d7316f8000af4a88451a9a","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lindsey","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/62d7314c94ed83001301023c/"},"datePublished":"2022-07-20T00:34:23.000Z","headline":"Friendly and efficient","reviewBody":"I've been a regular customer to Coles for several years now. They remind me of the fly buys, which is a fun incentive. The staff is friendly and efficient. What they are not so vocal about is that they are not supporting Australian businesses.  The bags are made in Vietnam.  (Check underneath next time you unpack your groceries).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"3"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"}]}

I was given a glib “Too late, you lose” response, “but thank you for shopping Coles online” from so-called customer service","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63b128182338b6d417ac94c0","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Suzanne Balen","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63b128073ad7900012d30d9e/"},"datePublished":"2023-01-01T08:28:40.000Z","headline":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE","reviewBody":"BAD CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE - RUDE STAFF & MANAGERI went to Coles Supermarket in Rouse Hill Shopping Center and while I was shopping my 5 year old granddaughter put 5 lollies in a plastic bag from the Lolly bar.  She didn’t know she couldn’t mix the different types in the one bag but did weigh them and put a label on with one item code.  When we got to the check out she put the bag on the conveyor belt which excitement and pride that she had done this.The check out lady TOFEA was rude in pointing out that the lollies could not be mixed.  As I was in a rush and didn’t have time to go back I asked her to put it through anyway as it wouldn’t make a difference to Coles stock control and only a few cents were involved.  She refused and was rude at the same time. My granddaughter burst into tears with the rudeness and the fact that she couldn’t have her lollies.I put in a complaint with the store manager JENNIE who was not in the least bit sympathetic.  They had no protocol for writing a complain .. no book to log the complaint … and just said she had heard what I had to say.I was so upset for my little granddaughter who was allowed these sweets as a special treat and then had them denied to her.Even other customers in the queue appealed to TOFEA to let the child have the lollies and she refused.Won’t be going back to COLES again.  RUDE STAFF … BAD EXPERIENCE","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/6387dc81252cba2c02e94bbd","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wales","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6387dc469fdc2c0012fe9415/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-01T00:43:13.000Z","headline":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a…","reviewBody":"Coles Greenslopes Qld 4120....once a great place to shop. I placed a home delivery order yesterday, received the usual confirmation email. and then a couple of hours later I received a \"courtesy\" email advising that my order had been cancelled with no reason given.  I tried phoning the number given but gave up after 15 minutes despite a recorded message constantly thanking me for holding and advising that someone would be with me \"shortly\".  I don't know what Coles management considers \"shortly\"  - perhaps they count on the long wait time causing customers to give up so they do not have to deal with complaints. Previously I had an order  booked for 8am-2pm delivery and it arrived at 5pm.  (I suppose I should be grateful it arrived at all!)  Woolworths delivery charges may be more expensive but at least they are reliable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/blog.coles.com.au/63167d7b6a3e1ed2c3cabc96","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/blog.coles.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dave Thompson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6314fa9883466e0012695575/"},"datePublished":"2022-09-06T00:51:40.000Z","headline":"Gutless Managers who dont want to talk to customers.","reviewBody":"Why are the managers at Coles gutless people and not want to talk to unhappy customers.
